events.title: MADHACK
events.subTitle: Mobile App Development Hackathon
events.description: MadHack 2021 is a Mobile Application Development workshop series together with a final hackathon which was organized by the IEEE Student Branch of UCSC

events.title: RevolUX
events.subTitle: Inter-university UI/UX Designathon
events.description: RevolUX is the first ever UI/UX designathon organized by the IEEE Student Branch of UCSC in collaboration with AIESEC in UOC

events.title: 7linesOfCode
events.subTitle: From Hello World to Machine Learning, in 7 days
events.description: 7 lines of code, is a 7-day workshop series initiated by the IEEE Student Branch of UCSC

events.title: IEEE Andaheraya 2021
events.subTitle: To learn more and be a part of IEEE
events.description: An event organized by the IEEE Student Branch of UCSC to educate its members about IEEE in a broader sense and to enlighten them about the many opportunities

events.title: IEEE Day 2021
events.subTitle: Celebrating Global IEEE Day
events.description: The IEEE day is celebrated worldwide for IEEE members to celebrate, gather and share knowledge on technological aspects as the future conquerors.

events.title: ReidXtreme 2021
events.subTitle: Competitive Programming Competition
events.description: ReidXtreme - a 24-hour Competitive Programming Competition exclusively for UOC Undergraduates.
